MCP Payment Wrapper

Payment wrapper for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers that adds payment verification and billing functionality

MCP Payment Wrapper API Reference / SessionOptions

Interface: SessionOptions

Defined in: interfaces/auth-service.ts:106

Session options for creating an authentication session

URL to redirect after authentication

user_hint?

optional user_hint: string

Defined in: interfaces/auth-service.ts:111

Email or username to pre-fill in the auth form
